title: Synesthesia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player and a sense to perceive them with.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will perform an action to your target based on the sense that you chose as well as one other random sense.
- Your sense of sight will reveal your target's faction.
- Your sense of smell will reveal how many charges of any limited-use abilities your target has remaining. If they do not have a limited-use ability, you will be notified about this.
- Your sense of touch will reveal your target's attack and defense values.
- Your sense of hearing will reveal if your target has any night chats and the last message sent in all of them if they do have any night chats.
- Your sense of taste will reveal if your target has any non-death immunities, such as roleblock or redirection immunity.
- With the Necronomicon, you unlock the sixth sense, which deals an Astral Basic attack to your target.

desc:
Post 478
*I see, smell, feel, hear, and taste dead people. All at once.*
